title: Deployment of Node.js Application
description: Deployed a Node.js app on AWS EC2 with auto-scaling setup.
tech: AWS EC2, Auto Scaling, Linux, NGINX

title: Kubernetes Cluster Setup and Microservices Deployment
description: Deployed a production-ready Kubernetes cluster using KOPS on AWS. Managed microservices with Helm, ConfigMaps, and Secrets.

title: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
description: Automated AWS infrastructure setup with reusable Terraform modules for VPC, EC2, and RDS.

title: Monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana
description: Set up Prometheus and Grafana dashboards for Kubernetes monitoring. Implemented alerting using Alertmanager.

title: Python Automation for Cloud Resource Management
description: Developed Python scripts using boto3 to automate EC2, S3, and IAM management. Improved operational efficiency.
